titles.title: IoT Standards Leadership Act of 2019

To direct the Secretary of Commerce to conduct a study and submit to Congress a report on the processes of international standards-setting with respect to internet-connected devices, and for other purposes.
IoT Standards Leadership Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
IoT Standards Leadership Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Commerce to report to Congress a study of (1) international bodies that set technological standards relevant to internet-connected devices, and (2) the appropriate means to ensure robust U.S. leadership in such bodies. (Technological standards for emerging technologies, such as next-generation wireless data communications, are typically set by international bodies that comprise various stakeholders, such as equipment manufacturers in the relevant industries.)
